Translations.Text: visvasigale, allahanige anjiri mattu sada neravada matanne adiri
allahanu nim'ma karmagalannu sudharisuvanu mattu nim'ma papagalannu ksamisuvanu. Allahana hagu avana dutara ajnegalannu palisidavanu nijakku maha vijayavannu sadhisidanu

navu i honeyannu akasagala, bhumiya hagu parvatagala mundittevu. Avugalu i hone horuvudakke hinjaridavu mattu idakke anjidavu. Konege manusyanu i honeyannu hottanu. Nijakku avanu akrami hagu ajnaniyagiddane

Allahanu kapata purusaru hagu striyarannu mattu bahudevaradhaka purusaru hagu striyarannu siksisuvanu mattu visvasi purusaru hagu visvasi striyara pascattapavannu svikarisuvanu. Allahanantu atyanta ksamasilanu karunamayiyu agiddane
hogalikegalella allahanige. Akasagalalli hagu bhumiyalliruva ellavu avanige serive. Paralokadallu ella prasansegalu avanige salluvavu mattu avanu atyanta yuktivanta hagu arivu ullavanagiddane
